column1: '''The Trumpets of Faerie''' refers to an [[Index:Unpublished material|unpublished]] book of [[Index:Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien|poems]] by  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
In [[1916]] Tolkien sent the original to ''Sidgwick & Jackson''
column2: for publication  but was rejected. According to Douglas A. Anderson
column3: Tolkien offered it to the Swan Press while he was at Leeds in the early 1920s  ''"and was again turned down"''; and after he returned to Oxford ''‘he made one further attempt
column4: and in the spring of 1926 the Oxford publisher Basil Blackwell turned it down’'' .<ref> [[Douglas A. Anderson]]
